title: 2018–19 Borussia Mönchengladbach season
text:
The <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20in%20German%20football">2018–19</a> <a href="Borussia%20M%C3%B6nchengladbach">Borussia Mönchengladbach</a> season was the 119th season in the <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club's history and <a href="List%20of%20clubs%20in%20the%20Bundesliga">11th consecutive and 51st overall season</a> in the top flight of <a href="German%20football%20league%20system">German football</a>, the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a>, having been promoted from the <a href="2.%20Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a> in <a href="2007%E2%80%9308%202.%20Bundesliga">2008</a>. In addition to the <a href="Football%20in%20Germany%23Bundesliga">domestic league</a>, Borussia Mönchengladbach also participated in this season's edition of the <a href="Football%20in%20Germany%23German%20Cup">domestic cup</a>, the <a href="DFB-Pokal">DFB-Pokal</a>. This was the 15th season for Mönchengladbach in the <a href="Borussia-Park">Borussia-Park</a>, located in <a href="M%C3%B6nchengladbach">Mönchengladbach</a>, <a href="North%20Rhine-Westphalia">North Rhine-Westphalia</a>, Germany. The season covered a period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019.
